name: places/ChIJ5fhz7VhYwokRUyXGAsxayv4
formattedAddress: 343 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 343 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: One of the greatest foot and ankle surgeons the world has ever known. I wish he could continue to work for another 50 years. He’s incredibly knowledgeable, insightful and just a decent human being. I’m a physical therapist by trade and I flew out to see him. He was just like I thought he would be. Down to earth and just a world class physician. I pray for his well being. Thank you Dr. Hamilton for your incredible contributions to foot and ankle surgery and rehabilitation. Scarf Bunionectomy plus Akin osteotomy. NOT AN EASY PROCEDURE WHICH VERY FEW ORTHOPEDISTS OR DARE I EVEN MENTION PODIATRISTS can perform....

originalText.text: Dr. Hamilton is the absolute best doctor I have ever come across. He is brilliant, incredibly skilled, an amazing diagnostician, kind, warm and caring beyond belief. They don’t come any finer than Dr. Hamilton.
